users.name: Barrera
users.message: The original idea for the game Left4DEAD, was to have the four survivors run around fighting the horde of undead left by Chuck Norris, eventually Defeating him and killing his horde of minions, however, halfway through production, the creators saw the error of their ways when no matter how hard they tried, they could not get the in game Chuck to die, cause no one can kill the Norris!

users.name: Kate Kovalenko
users.message: Chuck Norris can pull your entire skeletal system through any orifice on your body.

users.name: Oleg Kononenko
users.message: You have 5 days to do this!

users.name: Olga
users.message: Chuck Norris hasn't lived the American dream so much as he's skull-fucked it into submission.
